title: Why is there a food emergency in Sri Lanka?
description: With a weak economy and worsening Covid-19 situation, a food emergency has been declared in the country.

title: Emma Raducanu wins US Open by beating Leylah Fernandez for maiden Grand Slam
description: Emma Raducanu ends Britain's 44-year wait for a women's Grand Slam singles champion as she beats Leylah Fernandez to win the US Open.

title: Keeping up with the Californians: Recall vote 2021
description: A ragtag bunch of 46 challengers hope voters will remove the governor and let them run California.

title: Your pictures on the theme of 'breaking free'
description: A selection of striking images from our readers around the world.

title: US Open highlights: Emma Raducanu beats Leylah Fernandez to win maiden Grand Slam
description: Watch the best shots as Emma Raducanu wins the women's US Open to become the first British female winner at Flushing Meadows since Virginia Wade in 1968 and the first qualifier in the Open era to win a Slam.

title: Photographer's images 'like ghosts coming out the mist'
description: Guy Bellingham uses a 170-year-old technique to produce striking photos in remarkable detail.

title: ‘I offered them a snake, but they gave me a zoo’
description: Roughly 40% of the animals at Rutland Zoo come from other rescues.

title: 'I care about the climate but my dad works in the oil industry'
description: Stephanie worries about climate change, but her dad is a senior employee at BP.

title: Watch the winning moment
description: Watch the moment Britain's Emma Raducanu beats Canada's Leylah Fernandez to win the US Open women's singles final in straight sets.

title: Ronaldo was 'super nervous' before two-goal Man Utd return
description: Cristiano Ronaldo was "super nervous" before scoring twice on his Manchester United return - as boss Ole Gunnar Solskjaer says he has allowed fans to "dream" again.

title: England's Bairstow, Woakes & Malan pull out of Indian Premier League
description: Three England players withdraw from the Indian Premier League which resumes on Sunday, but nine others will take part.

title: 9/11 anniversary: Queen tells Biden the victims are in her prayers
description: In a message to the US president, the Queen also pays tribute to communities who joined together to rebuild.

title: Six men arrested in £160m cocaine haul off Plymouth coast
description: A British man is among six arrested on a luxury yacht carrying more than two tonnes of cocaine.

title: Raducanu v Fernandez in US Open final to be shown live on Channel 4
description: British teenager Emma Raducanu's history-making US Open final against Leylah Fernandez will be shown live on Channel 4

title: Covid: Ambulance boss apology and France ex-health minister under investigation
description: Five things you need to know about the coronavirus pandemic this Saturday morning.

title: Prince Andrew served with papers, accuser's team claims
description: Legal documents were served to a police officer in Windsor last month, US court papers say.

title: Highlights: Emma Raducanu beats Leylah Fernandez at Wimbledon 2018
description: Watch highlights from Emma Raducanu's last meeting with US Open final opponent Leylah Fernandez in the second round of the girls' singles at Wimbledon 2018.

description: The papers cover a court case against the Duke of York and the risk of tighter virus restrictions.

title: Red carpet debut for 'Bennifer' 2.0 in Venice
description: Ben Affleck and Jennifer Lopez arrive in Venice for the premiere of The Last Duel.

title: GPs say shortage of doctors puts safe care at risk
description: The Royal College of GPs says a failure to recruit enough doctors has put services under pressure.

title: Proms season draws to a close with a tango
description: The Last Night concert will also feature Wagner, accordion solos and Rule, Brittania!
